title: Warning on startup in dev mode: Unrecognized configuration key "quarkus.jacoco.report"

labels.name: triage/wontfix
labels.description: This will not be worked on

body:
### Describe the bug

I am using Gradle together with the Jacoco Gradle plugin and the `io.quarkus:quarkus-jacoco` extension as a `testImplementation` dependency.

I have configured `quarkus.jacoco.report` to be false in my `application.yaml` - this works as expected and prevents the duplicate and empty HTML report being generated by the extension so I can just use the HTML report generated by the Jacoco Gradle plugin.

However when running the application with `./gradlew quarkusDev` I receive a warning just after the banner:

```
WARN  [io.qua.config] (Quarkus Main Thread) Unrecognized configuration key "quarkus.jacoco.report" was provided; it will be ignored; verify that the dependency extension for this configuration is set or that you did not make a typo
```


### Expected behavior

No warning about an unrecognized configuration key "quarkus.jacoco.report"

### Actual behavior

Warning just after the banner on startup:

```
WARN  [io.qua.config] (Quarkus Main Thread) Unrecognized configuration key "quarkus.jacoco.report" was provided; it will be ignored; verify that the dependency extension for this configuration is set or that you did not make a typo
```


### How to Reproduce?

1. Add `id 'jacoco'` to the plugins block in `build.gradle`
2. Add `testImplementation 'io.quarkus:quarkus-jacoco'` to the dependencies block in `build.gradle`
3. Set `jacoco.report.enabled` to be false in your configuration (not in an any specific profile)
4. Start the application with `./gradlew quarkusDev`


### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

Darwin 20.6.0 Darwin Kernel Version 20.6.0: Tue Oct 12 18:33:42 PDT 2021; root:xnu-7195.141.8~1/RELEASE_X86_64 x86_64

### Output of `java -version`

openjdk version "11.0.8" 2020-07-14 OpenJDK Runtime Environment AdoptOpenJDK (build 11.0.8+10) OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM AdoptOpenJDK (build 11.0.8+10, mixed mode)

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

_No response_

### Quarkus version or git rev

2.5.0.Final

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

Gradle 7.3

### Additional information

_No response_
